backend/main.mo: Defines types for products, orders, media, and site content, and initializes in‑memory maps for products, orders, carousels, inquiries, user profiles, and configuration values.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing logo updates and component changes, with associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and admin modules.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base, component, and utility layers and declares light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, theme provider, lazy‑loaded pages, and profile setup modal handling based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin component for managing main carousel slides, including uploading/optimizing images, editing URLs, toggling, saving, and reordering slots.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin component for managing category‑specific carousel slides with the same edit, upload, and reorder logic as the main carousel.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Displays customer inquiries and allows admins to type and send responses, showing status and previous replies.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Lists orders, shows product and status details, allows status updates, and supports printing formatted order summaries.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products, handling fields plus optimized image/video uploads and existing media management.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with image display and form modal handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form for editing and saving site-wide content fields like contact info, policies, and footer text.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Carousel component that fetches category slides, filters and auto‑rotates them with hover pause, manual navigation, and slide click redirection.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component rendering brand section, contact info, policy links, and optional footer text.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Implements an auto-rotating homepage carousel with hover pause, slide transitions, and click-through support for enabled slides.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header navigation, auth handling, scroll-based UI changes, and route outlet rendering.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Displays detailed order info with status, cancellation logic, and a form for submitting cancellation reasons.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Renders a product media carousel supporting images and video with navigation arrows and slide transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with validation, backend submission, and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Skeleton-based loading placeholder for lazy-loaded routes.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file for a Stripe setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items, quantities, persistence, and total calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook that always returns the 'split' footer variant.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, carousel slides, and other backend data using an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a large set of CSS variables for a luxury-themed light and dark mode color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with permission checks, stats, and management components for products, orders, inquiries, and site content.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's cart with item management, pricing, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a two-step checkout flow collecting shipping details and UPI payment info before creating orders and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form requiring authentication and submits customer inquiries via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Displays authenticated customers' orders and inquiries with status info and order detail modal support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows product listings, category carousels, and allows authenticated users to add items to cart or navigate to product pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info, media carousel, and supports adding to cart or purchasing for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Provides client‑side utilities to resize, compress, and preview images and videos before upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom color palette using OKLCH variables, extended container, radius, and shadow settings, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state describing the task to crop a brand image to a transparent logo lockup and replace header/footer assets, along with related feature metadata and requirements.
